biocontainers.name: f5c
biocontainers.summary: An optimised re-implementation of the call-methylation and eventalign modules in Nanopolish.

biotools.summary: GPU Accelerated Adaptive Banded Event Alignment for Rapid Comparative Nanopore Signal Analysis | Re-engineered and optimised Nanopolish call-methylation module (supports CUDA acceleration) | An optimised re-implementation of the call-methylation module in Nanopolish. Given a set of basecalled Nanopore reads and the raw signals, f5c detects the methylated cytosine bases. f5c can optionally utilise NVIDIA graphics cards for acceleration

bioschemas.name: f5c

Given a set of basecalled Nanopore reads and the raw signals, f5c detects the methylated cytosine bases. f5c can optionally utilise NVIDIA graphics cards for acceleration
